domain.name: Person

entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

text:
"You must stay at home" - Boris Johnson says you may only leave home for the following reasons: 

- Shopping for basic necessities
- One form of exercise a day 
- Medical need 
- Travelling to and from work 

Read the #coronavirus measures in more detail: https://t.co/NJpO72P7v1 https://t.co/ee9TJ6z0Nq
